annotation.spannedText: all of this could have been avoided, had obligatory vaccination protected more children from getting infected by measles and other dangerous “childhood” diseases

annotation.spannedText: When it comes to vaccination, parents are not responsible for their own children only – their decision pro or against vaccination may have a significant impact on others
